CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 1, 1954, pg. 14 reads: "Brick Masons At Work On Belmar Gardens - Belmar Gardens, the 118-unit cooperative housing development in Twelfth Ward, is providing employment for some Negro skilled workers as the building progresses....Herbert McCrea finishes an inside corner on some of the block work...All the bricklayers are members of the Bricklayers International Union, Local No. 2 -Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Herbert McCrea, standing on ladder laying bricks at corner of cinder block brick structure in Belmar Gardens
